ygData.subject: Re: Banks
ygData.msgSnippet: The spell Winged Courier was removed from the game.  I would guess it was a balance issue. ... From: Kelly  To:
ygData.messageBody:
The spell Winged Courier was removed from the game. I would guess it was a
balance issue.


-----Original Message-----
From: Kelly <pruett@...>
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, May 28, 1999 4:06 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Banks


>From: Kelly <pruett@...>
>
>Absolutely correct on the closeness of ore being in Highpass. Add
sharpening
>stones to that list.
>
>Maybe Ironforge had a shaman friend? :-)
>
>-Faderic
>
>
>Tim West wrote:
>
>> From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
>>
>> I actually paid less for my banded in quenos because the demand there was
>> lower. Everyone in Freeport was ooc ing for banded. In Quenos, I was
the
>> only one at the time trying to get it. I did not know that Shamans and
>> Necromancers had a spell that moved items. I have never heard of anyone
>> bartering for this. A Shaman could make a lot of money by moving ore to
>> people in Quenos. I still cannot believe that ore can not be found in
>> Quenos and yet they have Ironforge Estate. What is he using to make his
>> weapons ? I understand that the closest place to get ore is from a NPC
>> in front of a mine entrance near Highpass. Can anyone verify this ?
>>
>> Thank You,
>>
>> Tanaman
>>
>
